titleStmt.title: Occasus occidentalis: or, Job in the VVest. As it was laid forth in two severall sermons, at two publike fasts, for the five associated westerne counties. By Iohn Bond B.L. late lecturer in the City of Exon, now minister at the Savoy, London. A member of the Assembly of Divines.
titleStmt.author: Bond, John, 1612-1676.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. D. for Fran. Eglesfield, and are to be sold at his shop, at the signe of the Marigold in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop, at the signe of the Marigold in Pauls Church-yard
